column2: have a  "mandatory right"  to  show cause in terms  of Section 6 of

the  Provincial  High  Court  has  failed 
to  consider  the  fact  that
there  is  a  long  delay  of  taking  steps  and  as  at  now  the  public
purpose for  which it was acquired, namely the security concerns
of the refinery no longer exits,
the Appellants were not paid any compensation.
